name: Pineapple Lore
description:
WASD To Move, Space To Jump

Tab To Open Toolkit (or C to upgrade immeadtily)

ESC - Pause Menu

RMB - To Shoot In The Bossfight

You Can Move In The Air, You Can Control How High You Jump

Made By Me And Ayhem123, I Did The Coding, He Did The Sound

Play As A Pineapple

 Put Homing Knifes On Fire Using Your Flamethrower

Find Easter Eggs!

This Game Is A Bit Hard, But Don't Worry! Kevin The AI Will Make It Easy On You!

Worship Billy Bob The God!

Listen To 6 Different Soundtracks!

Fight UFO The Boss!

This Is Pineapple Madness!
